Your to-do list will probably never be cleared. It will be okay if some things don’t get done (I keep telling myself 🙈) 

Have grace for yourself. Be safe and enjoy your first week with your students! #808educate @HIDOE808 @HSTAvoice @808TFellows @mschung808 @mrslittoITO 🍎

@KristiOda @canva I like to use the view-only link so I don’t always have to download a new file when I revise it. Because of this, every time I resize a file, it’s converting it to a video/animation. So all of the links I include are not clickable as a video with the view only link.

Preaching T self-care is not enough w/o also removing deliverables, non-negotiables, & compliance items. 

I get that schools have good intentions w/brain breaks, ice breakers, dancing but pls know that some Ts (🙋🏻‍♂️) are extreme introverts & it wears us down. #808educate @HIDOE808
